survey_name: Electric Vehicle Charging Station Accessibility Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on the accessibility, convenience, and user experience of public electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to help improve infrastructure and services.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for easy mobile response. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What type of EV charging connector do you most commonly use?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for less common connectors. Use dropdown for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: What type of EV charging connector do you most commonly use?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Use checkboxes for clarity.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized responses.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance public EV charging station infrastructure?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance public EV charging station infrastructure?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is not 'Never'.
